headline: Wells Fargo ends diversity policy for senior level recruitment, Bloomberg News reports
summary: The move will make the bank the latest in the financial industry to scale back its diversity, equity and inclusion (DEI) efforts after criticism from U.S President Donald Trump.  Trump has directed government agency chiefs to end "illegal discrimination" at federal agencies and in the private sector.  "DEI was a hoax that has been very bad for our country," he posted on social media platform Truth Social.

headline: Wells Fargo Scraps Diversity Policy for Senior-Level Recruitment
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Wells Fargo & Co. is the latest bank to join Wall Street’s retreat from diversity, equity and inclusion efforts as DEI comes under fire from President Donald Trump’s administration. headline: Is It Worth Investing in Wells Fargo (WFC) Based on Wall Street's Bullish Views?
summary: According to the average brokerage recommendation (ABR), one should invest in Wells Fargo (WFC). It is debatable whether this highly sought-after metric is effective because Wall Street analysts' recommendations tend to be overly optimistic. Would it be worth investing in the stock?
